text: <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2039/6> - want to get one of your opinions.  I like the fact that reuse is being attempted here, but want to make sure folks are okay with this versus moving some functionality into the common package
this should be a fairly easy fix, but probably worth do it sooner since txs will get dropped w/o getting caller notified <@U0XPR4NP4>  <@U0UGH3X7X>
